item.title: Dgraph's recap of GraphQL Conf - Berlin 2019
item.description: We took part in the recently held GraphQL conference in Berlin. The experience was fascinating, and we were amazed by the high voltage enthusiasm in the GraphQL community. Now, we couldn’t help ourselves from sharing this with Dgraph’s community! This is the story of the GraphQL conference in Berlin. The GraphQL connection If you’re wondering what does Dgraph has to do with GraphQL, here’s the answer. Dgraph had set its eyes and placed its bet on GraphQL very early.
